Name: Freezy Frost
Effect: If successful, remove all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits the Foe may have. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails. -1 Accuracy.
Description: The user touches its foe while playing "Freeze!". Surprisingly, the foe becomes frozen on a block of ice. Once they realize they were just playing pretend the ice dissolves into haze.
